detail: How to add custom message or text to login page.

issues.title: password
issues.description: HOW TO USE PASSWORD FIELDS AND HIDDEN FIELDS IN YOUR HTML5 FORM.
issues.other: A password field is a special text field on a web form that doesn’t display what the user types. Each keystroke is represented on the screen by a placeholder character, such as an asterisk or a bullet, so that someone looking over the user’s shoulder can’t see what they type.

issues.title: Email
issues.other: Usually, the invalid email address error happens when you have 2 or more contacts with the same name, but one of them doesnt have a valid email address. The solution is to empty the Outlook auto-complete list.

issues.title: Scrolling Problem
issues.description: Can't scroll within email messages – Got an idea? - Outlook UserVoice.
issues.other: I'm using a Mac laptop with OS 10.12.6 and Safari 10.1.2, (the latest versions) I've already cleared the cache etc. I was told by the "community support" area to post here. If anyone from Microsoft actually reads this, the problem is that I cannot read email messages because I cannot scroll down within the messages (in the inbox or elsewhere) - so, you can only see the top of the message and not the rest of it. Doesn't work in any way, so can't use a mouse with the scrollbar, arrow keys or page up/page down keys.

issues.title: sorting
issues.other: You can't use rank calculation as sorting key, but you can use rank() to filter the top N data, and in terms of sorting, e.g, rank(sum([sales])), you just need to sort your data by using the same expression you use in rank() function.

issues.title: Account deletion
issues.other: When you have multiple accounts you can not reset account number.

issues.title: Feed upgradation
issues.other: I was skeptical about the latest shift. Over the last decade, my News Feed has increasingly begun to clog with life updates from hundreds of people I haven’t seen in years. Meanwhile, my closest friends—like many people’s—share less on the platform than ever. After Facebook’s announcement, I deleted the app from my phone, less in protest than in resignation to it having become more of a phone book than a social network.

detail: You receive a The User Profile Service failed the logon error message

issues.title: Symptoms
issues.other: When you log on to a Windows 7-based or a Windows Vista-based computer by using a temporary profile, you receive the following error message.

issues.title: unknown
issues.other: nIt’s that wonderful moment: You’ve poured days, weeks, or maybe even months into building an amazing app, and it’s finally ready to share with the world. All you have to do is submit it to the App Store. How hard could that be, right?

issues.title: small list
issues.other: nCue mountains of grunt work: Capturing tons of screenshots, fighting Xcode provisioning, uploading to the App Store and constant mindless work! Aargh!

issues.title: Hello Title
issues.other: nWell, you’re in luck. :] Thanks to the amazing Felix Krause, there’s now a tool to do all this and more! It’s called fastlane, and it’ll become your new best friend.

issues.other: nThis tutorial also assumes you know about code signing and iTunes Connect. If you’re unfamiliar with these, please read this tutorial series first.
